title: [W]Claimant job title
p1: [W]It may help the tribunal if you can provide these details. You will not be penalised for not providing them.

whatIsClaimantJobTitle.label: [W]What is or was the claimant’s correct job title? (optional)

whatIsClaimantJobTitle.tooLong: [W]The job title entered must be less than 100 characters
